column2: Show the §Yde jure size§! and §Yde jure capital§! of [Root.GetBaseName]

We have [Root.title_info_controlled_counties.GetValue] counties in [From.GetBaseName].

We need [Root.title_info_required_counties.GetValue] ([Root.title_info_required_percent.GetValue]% of [Root.title_info_total_counties.GetValue]).

The de jure capital is [dejure_capital_target.GetBaseName].
